rules.reasoning: Non-superuser roles have {data.get('count')} explicit permissions granted. While permissions are necessary for role functionality, ensure adherence to the principle of least privilege by auditing each GRANT statement for over-privileging.
recommendations: List all permissions for affected roles: LIST PERMISSIONS ON ALL BY role_name;
Revoke excessive permissions: REVOKE permission_type resource_type FROM role_name;
Document the business justification for each permission granted to non-superuser roles
Implement regular permission audits as part of security compliance procedures
